oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: 'The History of Company "K" 117th Infantry In The Great War'
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This company history belonged to Pvt. Robert Rufus Rust, Co. K, 117th Inf. Regt., 30th Div. The inside front cover is inscribed in pencil "Philip Rust / Old Hickory, Tenn." with the opposite page marked "p. 74." Immediately below is written in red ink "p. 80." Rust's citation for bravery appears on page 74 and is encircled in pencil. He received the U.S. Silver Star and the British Military Medal as the 30th Div. served under British command. He moved to Old Hickory after the war and worked at DuPont.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World war, 1914-1918; World war, 1914-1918 - History
